text: int main ( ) { int T , j , r ; int y , numb = 0 , i , A [ 1000 ] , k , sum = 0 , B [ 1000 ] , s [ 1000 ] , c , x , e , n = 0 , u = 0 , N ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < T ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; y = numb + N ; c = numb ; for ( i = numb ; i < y ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & A [ i ] ) ; } for ( k = c ; k < y ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & B [ k ] ) ; } numb = y ; s [ j ] = N ; } for ( r = 0 ; r < T ; r ++ ) { x = u ; n = n + s [ r ] ; if ( A [ x ] >= B [ x ] ) { sum ++ ; } for ( e = x + 1 ; e < n ; e ++ ) { if ( ( A [ e ] - A [ e - 1 ] ) >= B [ e ] ) { sum ++ ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; u = n ; sum = 0 ; } }
